message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $200000. Your turn!
You wanted a fair split, now it's not so fair
You're trying to take advantage of the situation, but I'm not falling for it. Let's meet in the middle.
You're not willing to meet in the middle, so I'll take the high road
You're not willing to meet me in the middle, so I'll try to take the lead. Let's see if you'll accept a slightly better deal for me.
You're trying to take the lead, but I'm not letting you
You're not willing to give me the lead, so I'll try to take control. Let's see if you'll accept a slightly better deal for me.
You're trying to take control, but I'm still in the driver's seat
It's time to meet in the middle, Bob. Let's split the remaining money evenly.
